home.create_conversational_portfolio: Create a conversational portfolio that answers
home.unlimit_message_with_your_api_key_descri: No message limits.  Superior AI model for smarter conversations
home.unlimit_message_with_your_api_key: Unlimited message with your API KEY
home.loved_by_professionals_description: Join thousands who've transformed their online presence with an
home.answer_1: Fastfolio is an AI-powered portfolio builder that creates interactive, conversational portfolios. Your visitors can ask questions about your work and get instant, personalized responses.
home.question_2: How does the AI portfolio work?
home.answer_2: Simply add your projects, skills, and experience. Our AI learns from your content and answers visitor questions 24/7, making your portfolio more engaging than a static website.
home.answer_3: Yes. Choose from multiple themes, add custom sections, and personalize the AI responses to match your voice and style.
home.answer_4: We offer a free plan with core features. Pro plans unlock unlimited AI conversations, advanced analytics, and watermark removal.
home.question_5: How quickly can I create my portfolio?
home.answer_5: Most users have their AI portfolio live in under 5 minutes. Just add your content and publish.
home.question_6: Can recruiters and clients use it?
home.answer_6: Absolutely. Share your unique link and let visitors ask specific questions about your skills, experience, and projects - perfect for standing out in applications.
